    • org.apache.james.mailbox.hbase.HBaseUtils

      • mailboxFromResult

        public static Mailbox<UUID> mailboxFromResult(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result result)
        Creates a Mailbox object from a HBase Result object.
        Parameters:
        result - a result of a HBase Get operation
        Returns:
        a Mailbox object

      • mailboxRowKey

        public static byte[] mailboxRowKey(UUID uuid)
        This returns the row key needed for HBase. Having the method here ensure we have a consistent way to generate the rowkey. Convenience method for generating a rowKey when you don't have a mailbox object.
        Parameters:
        uuid -
        Returns:
        rowkey byte array that can be used with HBase API

      • UUIDFromRowKey

        public static UUID UUIDFromRowKey(byte[] rowkey)
        Returns a UUID from the a byte array.
        Parameters:
        rowkey -
        Returns:
        UUID calculated from the byte array

      • toPut

        public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put toPut(HBaseMailbox mailbox)
        Transforms the mailbox into a Put operation.
        Returns:
        a Put object

      • metadataToPut

        public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put metadataToPut(Message<UUID> message)
        Transforms only the metadata into a Put object. The rest of the message will be transfered using multiple Puts if size requires it.
        Parameters:
        message -
        Returns:
        a put that contains all metadata information.

      • messageRowKey

        public static byte[] messageRowKey(Message<UUID> message)
        Create a row key for a message in a mailbox. The current row key is mailboxID followed by messageID. Both values are fixed length so no separator is needed. Downside: we will be storing the same message multiple times, one time for each recipient.
        Parameters:
        message - message to get row key from
        Returns:
        rowkey byte array that can be used with HBase API

      • messageRowKey

        public static byte[] messageRowKey(UUID mailboxUid,
                   long uid)
        Utility method to build row keys from mailbox UUID and message uid. The message uid's are stored in reverse order by substracting the uid value from Long.MAX_VALUE.
        Parameters:
        mailboxUid - mailbox UUID
        uid - message uid
        Returns:
        rowkey byte array that can be used with HBase API

      • customMessageRowKey

        public static byte[] customMessageRowKey(UUID mailboxUid,
                         long value)
        Utility to build row keys from mailboxUID and a value. The value is added to the key without any other operations.
        Parameters:
        mailboxUid - mailbox UUID
        value -
        Returns:
        rowkey byte array that can be used with HBase API

      • messageMetaFromResult

        public static Message<UUID> messageMetaFromResult(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf,
                                  org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Result result)
        Creates a HBaseMessage from a Result object. This method retrieves all information except for body and header related bytes. The message content will be loaded on demand through a specialised InputStream called ChunkInputStream. IMPORTANT: the method expects a single version of each cell. Use setMaxVersions(1).
        Parameters:
        conf - configuration object for HBase cluster
        result - the result object containing message data
        Returns:
        a HBaseMessage instance with message metadata.

      • toPut

        public static org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.Put toPut(Subscription subscription)
        Creates a Put object from this subscription object
        Returns:
        Put object suitable for HBase persistence
